description:
BlockseBlock is a developer adoption platform designed to onboard, educate, and activate developers across the evolving tech landscape—including blockchain, AI, and other technologies. We have enabled protocols, startups to scale their developer adoption seamlessly with initiatives such as hackathons, hacker houses, founder houses, etc. 

Blockseblock’s Key stats: 
-125,000+ Developers 
-100+ hackathon hosted 
-600+ University partners like IITs, NITs, IIITs etc.
additional_impact: We brought highest number of developers for the PL Genesis hackathon and our community member won the hackathon as well.
testimonials:
Our developer won the global hackathon of Protocol Labs PL Genesis:

https://x.com/ShooraShubham/status/1946572158165197209

https://x.com/blockhacks/status/1946556049911116242?s=46
graduations_or_event_attendees:
We organized 3 developer workshops for the hackathon, where 600 developers came. We delivered the following KPIs for the hackathon:

450+ registrations
350+ developers
125+ projects
